sentences: On this issue (FCCC/SBI/2012/INF.3 and FCCC/TP/2012/1), NAURU stressed the importance of the item for AOSIS and said discussions on an international mechanism on loss and damage should start already at the current session.
TIMOR LESTE stressed the importance of addressing risk assessment and key methodologies in particularly vulnerable LDCs.
He identified the need for financial support for expert meetings on loss and damage preceding COP18.
Don Lemmen (Canada) and Lucas Di Pietro (Argentina) will consult informally.
